00019 #ifndef _IPL98_TYPES_CPP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_TYPES_CPP_H
00021 
00022 #include "../ipl98_setup.h" /* always include the setup file */
00023 
00024 /* A simple file which includes types used in both the C kernel and
00025    C++ part of the library. This file simply includes the corresponding
00026    kernel C file defining the types. It is ment as a simple way for the
00027    programmer using the C++ part of the library to include the IPL98
00028    types.
00029    Here is a short summary of the defined types and enums. Look at the
00030    kernel file for more information.
00031    Types defined:
00032       INT8
00033           UINT8
00034           INT16
00035           UINT16
00036           INT32
00037           UINT32
00038           FLOAT32
00039    Enums defined:
00040       IPL98_VERSION
00041           IMAGETYPE
00042           ORIGIN
00043           COLORTYPE
00044           CONNECTIVITY
00045           DIRECTION
00046           ROTATION
00047           COMPLEXCHOISE
00048 */
00049 #include "../kernel_c/ipl98_types.h"
00050 
00051 #endif /* _IPL98_TYPES_CPP_H */
